snippet: “Jane the Virgin” on CW and ‘Cristela” on ABC illustrate how much the setting and format matter when vibrant new talent is introduced on TV.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column examines new ABC series Jane the Virgin and CW show Cristela; praises both for looking beyond the cliches that bind many Hispanic characters on television, and for showcasing funny and engaging new actors instead of established stars.
lead_paragraph: “Jane the Virgin” on CW and ‘Cristela” on ABC illustrate how much the setting and format matter when vibrant new talent is introduced on TV.

headline.seo: ‘Jane the Virgin’ on CW and ‘Cristela’ on ABC
headline.main: Location, Location: A Lesson for Fresh New Sitcom Faces
headline.print_headline: Location, Location: A Lesson for Fresh New Sitcom Faces
